comments.text:
Thunderbird is changing to tabs on top in bug 644169, Lightning is following in bug 709572. This will add toolbars to Calendar and Task tabs, which will disrupt the Seamonkey UI. 

Currently I don't plan to remove any buttons in the UI (except maybe the "Add Task" button in the Task Tab) so having Seamonkey hide the extra toolbars won't cause loss of functionality.
